import{instance}from"./api";export var authAPI={me:function me(){return instance.get("auth/me").then(function(res){return res.data;});//.then(response => response.data);
},login:function login(email,password){var rememberMe=arguments.length>2&&arguments[2]!==undefined?arguments[2]:false;var captcha=arguments.length>3&&arguments[3]!==undefined?arguments[3]:null;return instance.post("auth/login",{email:email,password:password,rememberMe:rememberMe,captcha:captcha}).then(function(res){return res.data;});},logout:function logout(){return instance.delete("auth/login");}};
